author: nistefan
body:
#### PR description:

- Fixing MET significance and unclustered pT computation for PUPPI MET which failed previously for candidates inside jets due to clustering different particle collections with different momenta in PUPPI algorithm

- Replacing dE-matching by dR for PF MET and PUPPI MET

see https://indico.cern.ch/event/907376/contributions/3817800/attachments/2017480/3372271/PUPPI_in_RECO_and_unclustered_energy_fix.pdf

- Fixing issue that causes NaNs in DeepCSV output


#### PR validation:

Passed testRecoMETMETProducers and runTheMatrix.py tests

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

backport of #29331 and #24943, needed for proper Puppi MET and DeepCSV treatment

------------------------------------

From Slava's comment https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30572#issuecomment-662050822

- backports of two somewhat unrelated items:
    - DeepCSV numerical issue: from 104X #24943. These are added by default.
    - MET unclustered computation: from master #29331 #29392 and #29918: (or, more clearly consistently, from 10_6_X #29330 and #29392 and fixes in  #29919). To preserve consistency with production, these are added via run2_miniAOD_devel, as in 10_6_X
title: Fixing MET unclustered energy computation and DeepCSV NaN issue (backport of  #29331 and #24943)
